items.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
items.text: Creating web apps to be displayed on Kiosks, those big screens one can see in malls or airports, providing wayfinding to the user for shops & services on an indoor map of the building. Using Javascript (React framework), HTML and CSS. Involving 3D mapping and Data management too.

items.title: Front-End Developer
items.text: Coding project in a French Tech start up as part of my Software development class (HTML, CSS, Typescript, Angular 5).

items.title: 1st prize - Winning Team
items.text: Member of the winning team of Une Nuit pour Entreprendre at Ecole des Ponts ParisTech: a sleepless night competition, where we created a start up and pitched it in front of a jury in the morning. We were coached and challenged by entrepreneurs and professionals. Our start up was on a geolocalized public urban lighting.

items.title: Full-Stack Developer
items.text: Developing with HTML, CSS, Javascript and AngularJS the website for an automatic ID card reading and Python for some back-end work, in partnership with the Junior Enterprise of my school.

items.title: Automatic slides generator
items.text: Department project backed by the Boston Consulting Group during which we developed an automatic Power Point slides generator from any Word document, using Python mainly but also a little bit of XML.

items.title: Assistant
items.text: Multitasked worker on the Pogo Structures shipyard, the leading race sailing boat builder located in Brittany, France.

items.title: Computer teacher & Bug resolver
items.text: Teaching computer usage and resolving technological issues at my clients' home, during missions as a self-entrepreneur in a french tech start up.
